examples: The world's resources are rapidly diminishing.
Los recursos del mundo están disminuyendo rápidamente.
His influence has diminished with time.
Su influencia ha disminuido con el tiempo.
The new law is expected to diminish the government's chances.
Se espera que la nueva ley disminuya las posibilidades del gobierno.
I don't wish to diminish the importance of their contribution.
No deseo restar importancia a su contribución.
